name: Word Bank: Cookie Link Game
description:
Word Bank is a FREE, new type of the classic word search puzzle games.
You can play the game no matter where you are or what time it is, and you don't need to worry about whether there is internet or not as well.
Easy and interesting to play also with your family and friends.
You can improve your vocabulary, spelling skills, and even get your brain focused, trained or relaxed.
Download and enjoy the world of words right now!

How to play:
- Swipe to link the letters and build a valid word.
- Fill out all the letter boxes with words.
- Collect the hidden words.

When you get stuck at a difficult level:
- Press "Shuffle" button to shuffle the letters, and you may have more clues in your mind to recognize the valid word.
- Press "Hint" button to open a letter in letter box.
- Share the game with your friends, asking them for help, then you can play this awesome game together.

Features:
* 500+ levels
* Amazing sound effect
* Stunning graphics
* Social share feature
* Great exercise for the brain
* No time limit
* Play offline anytime & anywhere
